rukus.text: bulsinjadeul-eun haneulgwa ttang-i ha nayeoss-eum-eul alji moshaneunyo hananim-eunhaneulgwa ttang-eul bunlihago mul-eul modeun saengmyeongche-ui geunbon-eulo dusyeoss-euna geudeul-eun midji anihalyeo haneunyo
hananim-eun daejiwie sandeul-eul gojeongsikyeoss-euni geugeos-i dong-yochi mos hadolog ham-imyeo ttohan hananim-i geu an-e neolb-eun dololeul dueo geudeul-i indobaddolog hanola
hananim-eun haneul-e jal bohodoen jibung-eul dueossnola geudeul-eun ajigdo geugeos-ui yejeung-e deung-eul dolligo issneu nyo
geubunkkeseo bamgwa naj taeyang-gwa dal-eul changjohasini modeun geos-i geu an-eseo gwedo-e ttala unhaenghanola
hananim-eun geudae ijeon-e eotteon ingan-egedo yeongsaeng-eul buyeohaji a ni haessgeoneul ttohan geudaedo yeong-wonhal sueobs-eumae geudeul-i yeong-wonhal su issgessneu nyo
modeun ingan-eun jug-eum-eul masboge doemyeo hananim-eun neohuileul aggwa seon-eu lo siheomhalini ittae neohuineun hana nim-egelo gwiuihanola
bulsinjadeul-i geudaeleul bol ttaemyeon neohuiui sindeul-eul bibanghaneun jaga i salam-inyo lago geudaeleul jolonghal tta leum-ila sillo geudeul-eun hananim-eul geo yeoghaneun bulsinjadeul-ila
ingan-eun seong-geubhan sogseong-eulo chang jodoeeossnola naega jigeum geudaeege naui yejeungdeul-eul boyeojulini seoduljimalla
neohuiga jinsilhan jadeul-ilamyeon eonje i yagsog-i oneunyo lago geu deul-i malhalila
man-il bulsinjadeul-i geudeul-ui eol gullobuteo geuligo geudeul dwilobuteo bul-eul mag-eul su eobsdaneun sigileul al-ass-eul ttae geudeul-eun guwon-eul badgessneunyo
geuleohji moshalila geugeos-i gab jagi geudeul-ege dolaehayeo geudeul-eul honlanke hani geudeul-eun geugeos-eul mag-eul him-i eobs-eumyeo yuyedoejido anhnola
geudae ijeon-e manh-eun seonjijadeul do jolong-eul danghaess-euna jolong-eul hadeon geudeul-i jolonghaessdeon geos-e ewossaigomal-assnola
